name: Guardians of the Tomb (Skill Card)
skill_activation: At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.
skill_effect:
During your opponent's Main Phase, when a monster is Special Summoned from your Spell & Trap Zone to your field while you have no cards in your hand, you can draw 1 card, and if you do, you can Set 1 Spell or Trap from your hand.
This Skill can only be used once per turn.
